meanings.sent1: The inhumane treatment of animals at the shelter was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: It is inhumane to ignore the suffering of others.
meanings.sent3: The inhumane boss made everyone work late on a Friday.
meanings.sent4: The inhumane conditions in the prison shocked the visitors.
meanings.sent5: The inhumane dictator ruled with an iron fist, showing no mercy.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the standards of human behavior; barbaric
meanings.sent1: The inhumane act of bullying should never be tolerated.
meanings.sent2: The inhumane treatment of prisoners goes against basic human rights.
meanings.sent3: It was inhumane for the toddler to refuse to share his toys.
meanings.sent4: The inhumane behavior of the tribe was met with disapproval from neighboring communities.
meanings.sent5: The inhumane practice of child labor must be eradicated for a better future.
